title: Contact

contents:
Getting Started with Hugo Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again.
Installation Installing Hugo is straightforward:
# For macOS brew install hugo # For Windows choco install hugo -confirm # For Linux snap install hugo Creating a New Site To create a new Hugo site, use the following command:
hugo new site mysite Adding Content Create new content easily:
hugo new posts/my-first-post.md Running the Site Locally To see your site in action:
hugo server -D This will start a local server at http://localhost:1313/.
title: Getting Started with Hugo
